str2: Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: From nous; to exercise the mind, i.e. to comprehend, heed.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the same as aei; properly, an age; by extension, perpetuity; by implication, the world; specially a Messianic period.

parse: Verb - Perfect Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: From kata and a derivative of artios; to complete thoroughly, i.e. Repair or adjust.
From rheo; an utterance, ; by implication, a matter or topic; with a negative naught whatever.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Neuter Plural
str2: Prolongation for the base of phos; to lighten, i.e. Show.
